headline.print_headline: California Bill Would Increase Penalties for Soliciting Minors for Sex
headline.main: California Bill Would Increase Penalties for Soliciting Minors for Sex

docs.snippet: Adults convicted of soliciting underage prostitutes for sex will spend a minimum of two days in jail and face fines of up to $10,000 under a bill passed by the California legislature on Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Adults convicted of soliciting underage prostitutes for sex will spend a minimum of two days in jail and face fines of up to $10,000 under a bill passed by the California legislature on Thursday.

docs.snippet: Learn how to cut and pit a mango....

headline.print_headline: Tringale of Clear Mind After PGA Disqualification
headline.main: Tringale of Clear Mind After PGA Disqualification

docs.snippet: Cameron Tringale began the FedEx Cup playoffs with a 66 and a clear conscience....
docs.lead_paragraph: Cameron Tringale began the FedEx Cup playoffs with a 66 and a clear conscience.

headline.print_headline: Pentagon: Islamic State Militants Will Regroup
headline.main: Pentagon: Islamic State Militants Will Regroup

docs.snippet: U.S. airstrikes have helped Iraqi and Kurdish forces regain their footing in Iraq, but the well-resourced Islamic State militants can be expected to regroup and stage a new offensive, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel said Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: U.S. airstrikes have helped Iraqi and Kurdish forces regain their footing in Iraq, but the well-resourced Islamic State militants can be expected to regroup and stage a new offensive, Defense Secretary Chuck Hagel said Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Ice Bucket Challenge Goes Awry, Firefighters Hurt
headline.main: Ice Bucket Challenge Goes Awry, Firefighters Hurt

docs.snippet: Two firefighters were injured while using their fire truck ladder to help a college marching band take part in an ice bucket challenge, the school's president said Thursday....
docs.lead_paragraph: Two firefighters were injured while using their fire truck ladder to help a college marching band take part in an ice bucket challenge, the school's president said Thursday.

headline.print_headline: Friend of Boston Bomb Suspect May Get Seven-Year Term in Plea Deal
headline.main: Friend of Boston Bomb Suspect May Get Seven-Year Term in Plea Deal

docs.snippet: A friend of accused Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev pleaded guilty on Thursday to charges of hindering the investigation into the blasts in a deal with prosecutors that calls for a prison sentence of up to seven years....
docs.lead_paragraph: A friend of accused Boston Marathon bomber Dzhokhar Tsarnaev pleaded guilty on Thursday to charges of hindering the investigation into the blasts in a deal with prosecutors that calls for a prison sentence of up to seven years.

headline.print_headline: Federal Judge Strikes Down Florida's Gay Marriage Ban, Stays Ruling
headline.main: Federal Judge Strikes Down Florida's Gay Marriage Ban, Stays Ruling

docs.snippet: A federal judge in north Florida on Thursday struck down the state's gay marriage ban as unconstitutional, but stayed the ruling, leaving same-sex couples still unable to marry in the state....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal judge in north Florida on Thursday struck down the state's gay marriage ban as unconstitutional, but stayed the ruling, leaving same-sex couples still unable to marry in the state.

headline.print_headline: Ex-Nevada Lawmaker Taking Plea Deal in Vegas Cases
headline.main: Ex-Nevada Lawmaker Taking Plea Deal in Vegas Cases

docs.snippet: The only lawmaker ever expelled from the Nevada Legislature agreed Thursday to plead guilty in two Las Vegas criminal cases dating to the days before the 2013 legislative session, in a bid to get out of jail and into a mental health program....
docs.lead_paragraph: The only lawmaker ever expelled from the Nevada Legislature agreed Thursday to plead guilty in two Las Vegas criminal cases dating to the days before the 2013 legislative session, in a bid to get out of jail and into a mental health program.

headline.print_headline: Africa Tightens Ebola Travel Curbs as Affected Countries Face Food Shortages
headline.main: Africa Tightens Ebola Travel Curbs as Affected Countries Face Food Shortages

docs.snippet: African countries tightened travel curbs on Thursday in an effort to contain the Ebola outbreak, ignoring World Health Organization warnings that such measures could heighten shortages of food and basic supplies in affected areas....
docs.lead_paragraph: African countries tightened travel curbs on Thursday in an effort to contain the Ebola outbreak, ignoring World Health Organization warnings that such measures could heighten shortages of food and basic supplies in affected areas.

headline.print_headline: Court to Unseal Some Files in Probe of Gov. Walker
headline.main: Court to Unseal Some Files in Probe of Gov. Walker

docs.snippet: A federal appeals court decided Thursday to unseal two dozen documents in a secret investigation into whether Gov. Scott Walker's campaign illegally coordinated with conservative groups in 2012....
docs.lead_paragraph: A federal appeals court decided Thursday to unseal two dozen documents in a secret investigation into whether Gov. Scott Walker's campaign illegally coordinated with conservative groups in 2012.
